meanings.sent1: The gadwalls waddled by the pond.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of gadwalls swimming in the lake.
meanings.sent3: The gadwalls quacked happily as they splashed in the water.
meanings.sent4: The gadwalls glided gracefully across the surface of the pond.
meanings.sent5: The colorful gadwalls stood out among the other ducks.

meanings.definition: Gadwalls: the plural form of gadwall, referring to multiple ducks of this species
meanings.sent1: A flock of gadwalls flew overhead in a V formation.
meanings.sent2: The gadwalls nested in the reeds along the riverbank.
meanings.sent3: The gadwalls organized a duck race on the pond.
meanings.sent4: The gadwalls chattered excitedly as they searched for food.
meanings.sent5: The gadwalls migrated south for the winter.
